title: WHY DO I HAVE RANDOM 1.8K LAGSPIKES, RIOT?
body:
What is this bullshit, where I have normal games with 12 ping and the next second I have a fucking Lag Spike that disconnects me from my fucking game?!
I`m some done with your bullshit, riot, fuck your oceania shit servers, it`s the last bullshit on earth.
Get your fucking shit fixed and stop fucking me over in every single game I play!!!!!
I`m currently "playing" a ranked game, but i fucking can`, since i get cicked out of the game for no fucking reason.
I woudn`t be surprised, if i was banned for a few days or weeks or fuckign whatever, due to "leaving" fucking 3 or 4 games in a row due to this shit.
every game, I encounter at least 5 players with the same issue, IT FUCKING SUCKS!
fix that shit , riot

EDIT: NICE, THANKS RIOT! 20 MINUTE FUCKING PRIORITY FUCK NOW! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!
REALLY! THANKS!FUCK THIS "GAME"

replies.body: being serious though I've been getting this too, it's really irritating, one second it's fine 30ms, next second 600ms for 10 seconds, back to fine, then it just randomly repeat this over and over, it's definitely not my internet because it runs other games fine and it's only ever been an issue this past patch.
I have noticed that this has been an issue since patch

same here im usually 32 ping but since oce servers are the worst out of all of them i get random lag spikes for aboslutely no reason i also checked out if anyone else was downloading but nah nothing im always 32 ping but usually around night time i get bad spikes :S

I gave up from this shitty game!!!
I'm back Dota 2 :D 
Just Dota 2 with valve's servers:DDDD
maybe you should upgrade your dial up to a professional internet provider

It's not the OCE server, almost everyone I know has never really had an issue with OCE, and if they did Rito usually explained that there was live server maintenance or something happening during that time. Chances are it's your internet provider or you... Have a look around on your PC, there may be something downloading or sending every now and then that is giving you these lag spikes.

Better yet, why not have a break from league for awhile since you seem stressed. There's much more to do other than league.

Also, you encounter 5 people every game with this same issue??? Wtf? Wouldnt it end up as a 3v2 or something most of the time then? I smell bs on this statement.
Most games I play have at least 2-3 dc`s and 1 or more people lagging, it`s bs
